pages.text: In Beyond the Horizon, villagers are safer with the peaceful Overworld. $(br2)No need to imprison them in 'trading halls,' which are really just villager prisons! $(br2)Your villagers can roam free without fear of mobs, and you can trade with them easily.

This pack includes a Trade Cycler, so you don't have to constantly break their workstations to get the trades you want. $(br2)There's also a Trading Post, which makes it easier to trade with your free-range villagers!
